about_the_game:
The book of Meta Revelations tells of stories from the world of Eden - a world created by two Sovereign and governed by fourteen Daeva.

Riley Wrean is disrupted from his normal course of life on the mountains when a girl falls from the sky. This girl, Tay Karas, sends him on a discovery of the world below. Along the way, he will meet with friends and foe alike, while the beat of an ominous power looms over him.



  • Optional, partial voice acting from many talented actors, such as Lane. H Rush, Kyle Fraser, Deamonarcher and more.
  • A sizable amount of gripping cutscenes and narrative to suppliment roleplaying gameplay.
  • Inspired by the likes of Legend of Dragoon and Breath of Fire - acquire epic summons and transformations!
  • Interact with NPCs with multiple layers of dialogue and read every bookshelf!
  • Side quests with fulfilling story lore and rewards.
  • A whole wreath of quality custom creature art and story panels by Zephyrsword
  • Low system requirements, so you can play almost anywhere!

Voice Actors - A numbered of featured talent who have given me permission to list their appearance on this page.
Lane H. Rush (LofiSaiyan)

detailed_description:
The book of Meta Revelations tells of stories from the world of Eden - a world created by two Sovereign and governed by fourteen Daeva.

Riley Wrean is disrupted from his normal course of life on the mountains when a girl falls from the sky. This girl, Tay Karas, sends him on a discovery of the world below. Along the way, he will meet with friends and foe alike, while the beat of an ominous power looms over him.



  • Optional, partial voice acting from many talented actors, such as Lane. H Rush, Kyle Fraser, Deamonarcher and more.
  • A sizable amount of gripping cutscenes and narrative to suppliment roleplaying gameplay.
  • Inspired by the likes of Legend of Dragoon and Breath of Fire - acquire epic summons and transformations!
  • Interact with NPCs with multiple layers of dialogue and read every bookshelf!
  • Side quests with fulfilling story lore and rewards.
  • A whole wreath of quality custom creature art and story panels by Zephyrsword
  • Low system requirements, so you can play almost anywhere!

name: META REVELATIONS - RING SPIRITS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/2000 0 (64-bit OS is NOT supported)
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/2000 0 (64-bit OS is NOT supported)
  • Processor: PC with 1.5GHz Intel® Pentium® 4 equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in True Color mode
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Medo
Violência
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: As a new land is encroached by an ever growing power - that power now seeks out a girl who fell from the sky. A young man who encounters her, is swept on a journey of titanic proportions - that will cause him to discover his identity.
